extendedInfo.description: Fireplace sounds and beautiful photos to help you relax or go to sleep. 7 different beautiful natural Fireplace sounds ranging from raging to light and calm.Timer enabled so you can choose how long the fireplace runs for.The volume gently lowers down to 0 as timer expires so as not to disturb your sleep.Feature photo by Simon Lee CC BY-SA 2.0Fireplace sounds, fire sounds. Fireplace.In order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application. This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you.

reviews.title: So where are the options?
reviews.comment: I get one sound. The only thing I can change is the picture displayed. I only get half an hour of sound and when the screen times out so does the sound. No point in installing. This is for every one of these apps. White noise is a much better app. Even the free one is better. And I don\'t mean the white noise one by this developer. Uninstalled
reviews.author: Anthony Yonko

reviews.title: Once liked
reviews.comment: Because of the Google play AD I can\'t enjoy the app...so sad now uninstall..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only a single track.
reviews.comment: They say you get to pick from tracks, but the only thing you get to scroll through are poor quality pictures of a fireplace. Just another poor app tooting its own horn. Don\'t bother with it.
reviews.author: Kristopher Bailey

reviews.title: Not actual fire
reviews.comment: The sound is good but it is just pics of a fire.
reviews.author: Tina Conway

reviews.title: Happiness
reviews.comment: Reminds me of cold winter nights with a snow on the ground and the fire place roaring. Very cozy.
reviews.author: A Google User
